title: Account transfer lost
body:
Transferred my account from euw to na... now i can't log onto it on the site or ingame wether i try na or euw...
i can change the password for it, but still can't sign into it or anything, sent a ticket 2 days ago still no reply, anyone ever have this happen?
Anyway to fix this? Or can a GM check it out?

replies.body: The support ticket said the issue was resolved, but i'm still unable to connect, just reply'd to the ticket to make sure it's for the account name "terrafin2000" and not Rolant Riven R1, but yeah, days now i haven't been able to play xdd pls help
